alert.note: Alert for San Rafael Swell; Western Canyonlands (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 2:23PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Wayne and south central Emery Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 222 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Hanksville, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hanksville and Goblin Valley. This includes the following highways... Utah Route 24 between mile markers 111 and 133. Utah Route 95 between mile markers 0 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
